text: إِنَّ شَرَّ ٱلدَّوَآبِّ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فَهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

translation.en: Indeed, the worst of living creatures in the sight of Allah are those who have disbelieved, and they will not [ever] believe
translation.id: Sesungguhnya makhluk paling buruk di sisi Allah ialah orang-orang kafir, karena mereka tidak beriman
